trans-unit.source: Beta testing
trans-unit.target: Beta testing

trans-unit.source: Beta testing gives you the chance to improve your app based on feedback from individuals outside of your app-development team who try your unreleased app on their own devices.
trans-unit.target: Beta testing gives you the chance to improve your app based on feedback from individuals outside of your app-development team who try your unreleased app on their own devices.

trans-unit.source: Beta testing
trans-unit.target: Beta testing

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: *Beta testing* gives you the chance to improve your app based on feedback from individuals outside of your app-development team who try your unreleased app on their own devices.
trans-unit.target: *Beta testing* gives you the chance to improve your app based on feedback from individuals outside of your app-development team who try your unreleased app on their own devices.

trans-unit.source: This section describes your options for beta testing Universal Windows apps.
trans-unit.target: This section describes your options for beta testing Universal Windows apps.

trans-unit.source: Why beta test?
trans-unit.target: Why beta test?

trans-unit.source: To thoroughly test an app, you need to try it against as many device configurations and user interactions as possible.
trans-unit.target: To thoroughly test an app, you need to try it against as many device configurations and user interactions as possible.

trans-unit.source: Doing all of that testing in-house is difficult if not impossible.
trans-unit.target: Doing all of that testing in-house is difficult if not impossible.

trans-unit.source: With beta testing, users try your app on their own devices.
trans-unit.target: With beta testing, users try your app on their own devices.

trans-unit.source: And it's unmoderated: instead of performing specified tasks, users have complete freedom in how they use an app, so they can find issues that you might never have expected.
trans-unit.target: And it's unmoderated: instead of performing specified tasks, users have complete freedom in how they use an app, so they can find issues that you might never have expected.

trans-unit.source: With beta testing, you can:
trans-unit.target: With beta testing, you can:

trans-unit.source: Test your app on a variety of devices.
trans-unit.target: Test your app on a variety of devices.

trans-unit.source: Identify performance issues and other bugs that you might not have found otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Identify performance issues and other bugs that you might not have found otherwise.

trans-unit.source: Get real-world usage info that can be used improve the user experience.
trans-unit.target: Get real-world usage info that can be used improve the user experience.

trans-unit.source: Receive feedback without affecting public ratings in the Windows Store.
trans-unit.target: Receive feedback without affecting public ratings in the Windows Store.

trans-unit.source: When to beta test
trans-unit.target: When to beta test

trans-unit.source: It's best to conduct beta testing as the final stage of testing before you release your app.
trans-unit.target: It's best to conduct beta testing as the final stage of testing before you release your app.

trans-unit.source: At that point, you have tested the app as thoroughly as you can yourself, and you've covered all explicit use cases.
trans-unit.target: At that point, you have tested the app as thoroughly as you can yourself, and you've covered all explicit use cases.

trans-unit.source: Beta testing is not a substitute for other testing methods.
trans-unit.target: Beta testing is not a substitute for other testing methods.

trans-unit.source: Since beta testing is unmoderated, participants may not catch all bugs in your code because every tester's experience is self-directed and it's unlikely that they'll explore all features of the app.
trans-unit.target: Since beta testing is unmoderated, participants may not catch all bugs in your code because every tester's experience is self-directed and it's unlikely that they'll explore all features of the app.

trans-unit.source: But beta-testing feedback can give you a final wave of real-world feedback that reveals issues that you might never have expected before you go live.
trans-unit.target: But beta-testing feedback can give you a final wave of real-world feedback that reveals issues that you might never have expected before you go live.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: In the unified Windows Dev Center dashboard, you can limit distribution of your apps to only your testers, regardless of which operating systems your app targets.
trans-unit.target: In the unified Windows Dev Center dashboard, you can limit distribution of your apps to only your testers, regardless of which operating systems your app targets.

trans-unit.source: There’s no need to create a separate version of your app with a separate name and package identity; you can do your testing, then create a new submission when you’re ready to make the app available to everyone.
trans-unit.target: There’s no need to create a separate version of your app with a separate name and package identity; you can do your testing, then create a new submission when you’re ready to make the app available to everyone.

trans-unit.source: (Of course, you can create a separate app for testing only if you prefer.
trans-unit.target: (Of course, you can create a separate app for testing only if you prefer.

trans-unit.source: If you do, make sure to give it a different name from what you intend as the final, public app name.)
trans-unit.target: If you do, make sure to give it a different name from what you intend as the final, public app name.)

trans-unit.source: See [Beta testing and targeted distribution](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt185377) to learn how to submit your app to the Store for beta testing.
trans-unit.target: See [Beta testing and targeted distribution](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt185377) to learn how to submit your app to the Store for beta testing.
